How Long We Keep Your Information

The most common types of information we collect include names, emails addresses, IP addresses, other contact details, photos, payment information such as payment agent details, transactional details, customer and technical support queries, forum posts and comments, content you instruct us to make available on our Sites (such as item descriptions), and web analytics data.
